key.name: transition-speed
key.description: How fast the panel fades in and out.

key.name: maximized-opacity
key.description: The opacity of the panel when there are maximized windows [0-255].

key.name: unmaximized-opacity
key.description: The opacity of the panel when there are no maximized windows [0-255].

key.name: hide-corners
key.description: Hides the rounded corners of the panel. (improves fade aesthetic)

key.name: force-animation
key.description: Overrides 'gtk-enable-animations' on installations where animations are disabled.

key.name: panel-color
key.description: The background color of the panel.

key.name: current-user-theme
key.description: The name of the current theme that this extension has analyzed.

key.name: force-theme-update
key.description: If true the extension will always update theme data on the next startup.

key.name: panel-theme-color
key.description: The background color of the panel as described by the user's theme.

key.name: theme-opacity
key.description: The background opacity of the panel as described by the user's theme.

key.name: enable-opacity
key.description: Whether to enable custom opacities or use the theme values.

key.name: enable-background-color
key.description: Whether to enable custom coloring or use the theme value.

key.name: text-shadow
key.description: Adds a shadowing effect to make the panel's text readable on light backgrounds.

key.name: icon-shadow
key.description: Adds a shadowing effect to make the panel's icons visible on light backgrounds.

key.name: text-shadow-position
key.description: The position of the text shadow. (h-offset, v-offset, radius)

key.name: icon-shadow-position
key.description: The position of the icon shadow. (h-offset, v-offset, radius)

key.name: icon-shadow-color
key.description: The color of the icon shadow. (red, green, blue, alpha)

key.name: text-shadow-color
key.description: The color of the text shadow. (red, green, blue, alpha)

key.name: text-color
key.summary: What color the panel text should be.
key.description: What color the panel text should be.

key.name: maximized-text-color
key.summary: What color the maximized panel text should be.
key.description: What color the panel text should be when windows are maximized

key.name: enable-text-color
key.description: Whether to enable custom primary text coloring or use the user's theme values.

key.name: enable-maximized-text-color
key.description: Whether to enable custom secondary text coloring when a window is maximized or not.

key.name: enable-overview-text-color
key.description: Whether to enable secondary custom text coloring when the overview is visible.

key.name: remove-panel-styling
key.description: Whether certain usually incompatible theme styles should be removed.

key.name: app-overrides
key.description: Contains a list of the ids for all apps with custom settings.

key.name: window-overrides
key.description: Contains a list of the WM_CLASS for all apps with custom settings.

key.name: trigger-apps
key.summary: Apps that will always trigger the panel when focused.
key.description: List of app ids that trigger the panel when a window of the app is in focus.

key.name: trigger-windows
key.summary: Windows that will always trigger the panel when focused.
key.description: List of windows that triggers the panel when a window of the app is open.

key.name: transition-type
key.description: The transition function used on the panel

key.name: transition-with-overview
key.description: Transition the panel at the same time as the overview

key.name: transition-windows-touch
